it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.client

Class ClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.client.ClientSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ClientSocket
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    Class to load the Client, both from CLI and GUI This class is used only for a Socket-type connection
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientSocket

        public ClientSocket(java.lang.String host)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Constructor of the Socket Client
        Parameters:
        host - The IP address of the Server
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the path represent an Unknown IP
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network error

    • Method Detail

      • addView

        public void addView(View view)
        Method used to add the View (GUI or CLI) as Observer of the ClientSocket and vice versa
        Parameters:
        view - The view to add

      • send

        public void send(GenericMessage message)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to send a GenericMessage from the User to the Server
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network error, such as a connection closing

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Method used to know if the connection is still active
        Returns:
        True if the Client is connected to the Server, otherwise False

      • readMessage

        public void readMessage()
        Method called to start to read messages from the socket. The client is in waiting of a message from the Server

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to close the connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there are some problems in closing

      • startReading

        public void startReading()
        Method that start the communication with the Server. It is used to read always a message from the socket

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable sender,
                   java.lang.Object message)
        Method used when the user give an input to send to the Server
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                java.io.IOException
        Main method to start the ClientSocket Class
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the String host = "IP address" is an Unknown IP address
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network problem
